sent.orig: Eventually, everything electric will be able to network using wireless communications.
sent.trans: 最终，任何电器将能够利用无线通信进行联。

sent.orig: Chronic migraine causes brain damage that eventually reduces intellectual ability.
sent.trans: 慢性偏头痛引起大脑损伤，最终会降低智力。

sent.orig: His endless recounting of the incident eventually became unbearable.
sent.trans: 他无休止地重复这一事件最终让人忍无可忍。

sent.orig: I really hope that you can turn the corner and make it eventually!
sent.trans: 我真心希望你能克服难关，并最终取得成功！
